fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You have a list of all the players (randomized) and all the roles in the game (also randomized). One fifth (rounded down, if needed) of the players will be in the *exact* same numeral spot as their role. If a player dies, they and their role be removed from both lists, even if their role was hidden for whatever reason. However, numerical positions will not go down from this.
*NOTE: If a player changes roles for any reason, it will reflect on your list.*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill a **majority** of the players whose numeral spot is the same as their role's. Killing counts as you either directly attacking them at night and dying from it, or you having voted them when they get hanged. If someone dies another way, you will not get credit for it.
